about.heading: About us
about.body: At <brand>Lueve</brand>, we’re more than just jewelers—we’re your personal jewelry piece partner. Specializing in <wedding>customized wedding</wedding> and <engagement>engagement rings</engagement>, we exist to help you craft pieces that are as unique and meaningful as your love story. Every sparkle, curve, and setting is a reflection of you—your taste, your journey, your forever.

items.q: How long does it take to create a custom ring?
items.a: Creating a custom ring usually takes 4 to 6 weeks, depending on the complexity of the design and the materials chosen. We recommend starting the process early to ensure we have enough time to perfect every detail.

items.q: What materials and gemstones do you use?
items.a: We use only high-quality precious metals such as 18K gold, yellow gold, white gold, and rose gold. But you can request higher / lower gold percentage. Minimum start from 12K gold and maximum 20K gold option. For gemstones, we source authentic diamonds and other precious stones, all certified by reputable institutions such as the Gemological Institute of America (GIA) to ensure their authenticity and brilliance.

items.q: Do you offer after self service
items.a: Yes, we provide complimentary ring sizing during the design process. If you need adjustments after your ring is completed, we also offer resizing services to ensure the perfect fit. Including free jewelry cleaning and free gold re-chroming.

items.q: I don’t know what I want yet. Can you help me design it?
items.a: Absolutely. Our team will guide you through every step from exploring your preferences to sketching ideas and finalizing the design. Whether you have a clear vision or need inspiration, we’re here to help create a ring that truly reflects your love story.

Currently, our custom rings are available for domestic delivery within Indonesia. For international requests, please contact our team directly and we will be happy to assist you with the best possible arrangement.

items.q: What if I need the ring urgently?
items.a: If you have a tight deadline, let us know during your consultation. While our standard timeline is 4–6 weeks, we may be able to accommodate urgent orders depending on the design and production schedule.

aboutBrand.title: About LUEVE
aboutBrand.body: We chose this slogan to remind every couple to always cherish the day they committed themselves to one another in the sacred bond of marriage. It’s more than a ring, it’s a timeless reminder of your most meaningful promise.

items.title: Exquisite Results, Bespoke for You
items.desc: Since 2018, LUEVE has specialized in creating engagement and wedding rings that go beyond jewelry,  we craft enduring legacies. Each ring is a refined artistry, advanced techniques, and meaningful intention.

items.title: Meaningful Luxury with Lasting Benefits
items.desc: LUEVE rings are designed not only to shine on the day you say 'I do', but to accompany you for a lifetime. From exceptional comfort to symbolic design storytelling, every detail is made to serve both form and emotion.

items.title: Elite After-Sales Support
items.desc: Enjoy lifetime service including complimentary ring cleaning, polishing, and resizing support. Our service doesn’t end at the delivery — it continues, just like your love.

items.title: Exclusivity Rooted in Your Story
items.desc: No two rings are alike. Every design is created exclusively for you, inspired by your journey and craftsmanship with rare precision. With LUEVE, your love story becomes a one-of-a-kind heirloom.

items.title: Only the Finest Gems – GIA Certified Diamonds
items.desc: Our diamonds and gemstones are exclusively selected through magnifying glass. GIA certified start from 0,20 carat each. Both in D E F color and VVS clarity because true luxury starts with trust in every stone.

items.title: Founded in 2018
items.desc: Lueve began as a jewelry custom consultation dedicated to creating one of a kind engagement and wedding rings. Begin with unreleased store, just a passion for artistry and devotion to detail, we started by crafting intimate pieces for clients.

items.title: Exclusive Personal Ring
items.desc: As word spread, Lueve began to serve more couples looking for deeply personal rings something they couldn’t find in conventional jewelry stores. Every piece was handcrafted with care, for clients who valued meaning above all.

items.title: A trusted Name
items.desc: As the years unfolded, more and more couples came to us not for trends, but for authenticity. With each story shared and each ring delivered, LUEVE evolved from a hidden gem into a trusted name among those who appreciate understated luxury and emotional depth in fine jewelry.
